com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils

Class ItemUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.utils.ItemUtil

  • public class ItemUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains item stack, item and inventory utilities

      • canTransferAll

        public static boolean canTransferAll(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack[] from,
                                     org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory to)
        Tests if the given ItemStacks can be fully transferred to another array of ItemStacks
        Parameters:
        from - ItemStack source array
        to - destination Inventory
        Returns:
        True if full transfer was possible, False if not

        Tests if the two items can be merged

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory from,
                           org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory to,
                           ItemParser parser,
                           int maxAmount)
        Transfers all ItemStacks from one Inventory to another
        Parameters:
        from - The Inventory to take ItemStacks from
        to - The Inventory to transfer to
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of items to transfer, -1 for infinite
        parser - The item parser used to set what items to transfer. Can be null.
        Returns:
        The amount of items that got transferred

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack from,
                           org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory to,
                           int maxAmount)
        Transfers the given ItemStack to multiple slots in the Inventory
        Parameters:
        from - The ItemStack to transfer
        to - The Inventory to transfer to
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of the item to transfer, -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        The amount of the item that got transferred

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory from,
                           org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to,
                           ItemParser parser,
                           int maxAmount)
        Tries to transfer items from the Inventory to the ItemStack
        Parameters:
        from - The Inventory to take an ItemStack from
        to - The ItemStack to merge the item taken
        parser - The item parser used to set what item to transfer if the receiving item is empty. Can be null.
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of the item to transfer, -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        The amount of the item that got transferred

      • transfer

        public static int transfer(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack from,
                           org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to,
                           int maxAmount)
        Merges two ItemStacks together
        - If from is empty or null, no transfer happens
        - If to is null, no transfer happens
        - If to is empty, full transfer occurs
        Parameters:
        from - The ItemStack to merge
        to - The receiving ItemStack
        maxAmount - The maximum amount of the item to transfer, -1 for infinite
        Returns:
        The amount of the item that got transferred

      • transferInfo

        public static void transferInfo(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack from,
                                org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack to)
        Transfers the item type, data and enchantments from one item stack to the other
        Parameters:
        from - which Item Stack to read the info
        to - which Item Stack to transfer the info to

      • cloneInventory

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory cloneInventory(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory)
        Creates a copy of an existing inventory, with all fields deeply copied. Changes to this returned inventory will not affect the original inventory. The returned inventory is not of the same class type!
        Parameters:
        inventory - to clone
        Returns:
        cloned inventory

        Parameters:

        Returns:

                               org.bukkit.Material type,
                               int data,

        Removes certain kinds of items from an inventory
        Parameters:
        inventory - to remove items from
        itemid - of the items to remove
        data - of the items to remove, -1 for any data
        amount - of items to remove, -1 for infinite amount

        Returns:
        Empty item stack

      • createItem

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack createItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack item)
        Creates a new ItemStack that is guaranteed to be a CraftItemStack with a valid NMS ItemStack handle. If the original item is a CraftItemStack, the handle is re-used.
        Parameters:
        item - to use as input

        Returns:

      • findItem

        public static org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack findItem(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                                                      org.bukkit.Material type,
                                                      int data)
        Obtains an item of the given type and data in the inventory specified
        If multiple items with the same type and data exist, their amounts are added together
        Parameters:
        inventory - to look in
        type - of the items to look for, null for any item type
        data - of the items to look for, -1 for any data
        Returns:
        Amount of items in the inventory

      • getItemCount

        public static int getItemCount(org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory inventory,
                               org.bukkit.Material type,
                               int data)
        Gets the total item count of a given type and data
        Parameters:
        inventory - to look in
        typeid - of the items to look for, null for any item
        data - of the items to look for, -1 for any data
        Returns:
        Amount of items in the inventory

      • getMaxDurability

        public static int getMaxDurability(org.bukkit.Material itemType,
                                   int def)
        Gets the max durability value for a given item. When the durability values becomes larger than this value, the item breaks. Items that do not use durability return def here.
        Parameters:
        itemType - of the item
        def - to return for invalid items (that do not have durability)
        Returns:
        max durability

      • getMaxDurability

        public static int getMaxDurability(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Gets the max durability value for a given item. When the durability values becomes larger than this value, the item breaks. Items that do not use durability return 0 here.
        Parameters:
        stack - to get the max durability
        Returns:
        max durability

      • hasDurability

        public static boolean hasDurability(org.bukkit.Material itemType)
        Checks whether a particular item material type uses durability for automatically breaking the item after a number of uses.
        Parameters:
        itemType - to check
        Returns:
        True if durability is used

      • setMetaTag

        public static void setMetaTag(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack,
                              CommonTagCompound tag)
        Sets the Metadata tag stored in an item. If tag is null, all metadata is cleared.
        Parameters:
        stack - to set the metadata tag of
        tag - to set to

      • getMetaTag

        public static CommonTagCompound getMetaTag(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack)
        Obtains the CommonTagCompound storing metadata for an item. If the item has no metadata tag yet, null is returned instead.
        Parameters:
        stack - to get the tag compound for
        Returns:
        Tag Compound, or null if none exist.

      • getMetaTag

        public static CommonTagCompound getMetaTag(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack stack,
                                           boolean create)
        Obtains the CommonTagCompound storing metadata for an item
        Parameters:
        stack - to get the tag compound for
        create - whether to create a new tag if one does not exist
        Returns:
        Tag Compound, or null if none exist and create is false

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • getItemVariants

        public static java.util.List<org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack> getItemVariants(org.bukkit.Material itemType)
        Gets a list of valid items of a particular item type. A list with only a single variant will be returned if the item has no other variants.
        Parameters:
        itemType -
        Returns:
        item variants

      • getItemTypes

        public static java.util.List<org.bukkit.Material> getItemTypes()
        Gets a list of valid materials that can be items stored in a player's inventory. Blocks that can not be used as items are excluded.
        Returns:
        list of valid inventory item types
